title: A note on subvarieties of powers of OT-manifolds
abstract:
It is shown that the space of finite-to-finite holomorphic correspondences on
an OT-manifold is discrete. When the OT-manifold has no proper infinite
complex-analytic subsets, it then follows by known model-theoretic results that
its cartesian powers have no interesting complex-analytic families of
subvarieties. The methods of proof, which are similar to [Moosa, Moraru, and
Toma ``An essentially saturated surface not of K\"ahler-type", {\em Bull. of
the LMS}, 40(5):845--854, 2008], require studying finite unramified covers of
OT-manifolds.
